DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect four week treatment two investigational drug ( oral versus inhale administration ) plus inhaled medication treatment airway constriction bring exercise participant asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Two Investigational Drugs Prevention Airway Constriction Brought Exercise Participants With Asthma ( 0476-911 )
DOC.criteria: 614 year old child history asthma least 12 month must demonstrate airway constriction bring exercise taking medication allow study
